features: Upgraded Portable Lock Fits Most Door Types: With a wing butterfly screw (no drill needed), WINCHY door lock can adjust to accommodate more door types with different thicknesses, widely used in apartments, rentals, offices, Airbnb, hotels, motels, college dorms, homes, bedrooms, etc. The 304 stainless steel door lock is small but will hold your door shut firmly, keeping out your landlord, housekeeping at hotels, or anyone else that you want to keep out when you are in the room and need privacy

304 ‎Stainless Steel Heavy Duty Lock, More Sturdy and Safe: WINCHY portable door lock is all metal and not plastic, heavy-duty, and strong enough to provide effective safety and protection for Hotels, Apartments, Dormitories, Bathrooms, and Bedrooms. Perfect hotel door locks for travelers

Super Easy to Use No Drill Door Lock: No need to nail or screw into anything, just insert the claws into the strike plate, close and lock the door, and then tighten the wing butterfly screw. WINCHY door lock upgrades an additional nut to fit the issue when the door and door frame have different surface levels, adjust this additional nut to cover the level difference. Then no one could get in and in case of an emergency you could remove the lock in seconds in the dark

Compact Size and Travel Safety, Perfect Travel Gadgets and Gift Ideas: Size 3.62 x 2.48 x 0.47 inches (9.20 x 6.30 x 1.20 cm), lightweight and small, you can put it in a pocket, handbag, briefcase, backpack, or suitcase. Take WINCHY travel door lock for your own trips, or send it as a travel gift for the one who likes traveling, add a portable door lock to provide a strong sense of safety and peace of mind for travelers, college students, singles, at-home parents

Package Included and Professional Customer Service: 1 x black 304 ‎stainless Steel portable door lock, 1 x black pouch, 1 x user manual, and 1 x gift box. WINCHY Customer Service Team is set to ensure your satisfactory shopping experience. Any questions during using our portable door lock, feel free to contact us and we will find the right solution for you

Why Choose WINCHY Upgraded Door Lock?

Upgraded Design When the door and door frame have different surface levels, adjust this additional nut to cover the level difference. Attention 1 Kindly ensure a minimum gap of 0.12 inches between the door and its frame for the lock to fit properly and function successfully. Attention 2 The metal sheet needs to be kept horizontal to block the door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and secure!
reviews.reviewText: So, my daughter found a spare key to her apt taped outside her door and has not felt safe even though she took it in. I got this for her on the advice of a master locksmith and it works so well she even got a letter asking her to remove her "deadbolt"! No one can get in there without her knowledge now!! Super easy to use, super sturdy and heavy, works perfectly. And now her lock was fixed she can keep using it or save it for travel. Zero regrets!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a pretty little iron-like door jamb. I fits in right next to your door knob. I use it at night all the time for safety. Easy to take off and easy to put on. Exceptionally sturdy and portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very well built
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use and feels safe. The one side sits on the door frame which makes the other side further from the door. I’m not sure how to fix that but I tip it sideways a bit so it fits. Not sure if it’s as sturdy that way but I feel safer anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Single post/screw is not effective
reviews.reviewText: I tried installing this travel lock both in the deadbolt strike and the door handle strike, and I found both ways that the single post/screw design is just not effective. The lock is supposed to be held in place by tightening the screw so that the side post creates leverage against the doorframe. However, as you continue to tighten the screw, the whole device just leans off to the side until you are about to screw the metal wings into your doorframe (because the side post isn't long enough) and still have no stability to the lock. Also, the minute the deadbolt is undone or the door handle is turned, the wedge-piece of the lock has nothing to hold it up straight inside the strike plate, so the entire lock just collapses and it's hit or miss if it would still prevent someone from entering at that point. If the person trying to enter jiggled the door handle enough, they could easily circumvent this lock. Either way, your doorframe is going to take a beating because the device has no padding. It really needs double side posts with padding to create leverage against both the doorframe and the door so that the main screw doesn't tilt sideways or collapse as soon as the door handle moves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works perfectly to add extra privacy for a bedroom connected to a shared bathroom. Super easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my daughter for a business trip. Easy to use and really secures the door. Will be ordering another for my wife and i.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I got trapped IN the hotel room.
reviews.reviewText: I used this in a hotel room. (For the record, I'm pretty handy and really good at figuring things out quickly.) Took a little less than 2 min to figure out how to get it install properly for first time- which is fair since it was a new device and a new-to-me door. Took about 7 min to get it off. I thought I was gonna be trapped in the hotel forever. It could have been the wrong fit for the door or it could have been operator error. Either way, I won't be using this again. I'd return it if I could find the box it came in.However, if this style of door security works for you, you should know that it feels sturdy and sort of heavy, which I attribute to being higher quality. It was simple enough to install. It came in a drawstring bag. Worth a try if nothing else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use once you figure out how to use it. Instructions were limited. I feel safer having these on my doors. Make sure wing nut screw is loosened all the way, and that tongue of devise is facing right when inserting into lock.
